message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be fair to propose a price of $950000 for this exceptional item. I hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $875000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and the features of the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your input and understand your perspective. In light of that, I am proposing a price of $900000 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our initial offers, aiming for a mutually beneficial transaction.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still think $825000 is a more reasonable price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your budget constraints. To further explore a potential agreement, I am willing to consider $850000 as the price for the product. This is a fair compromise that takes into account both our interests.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $800000, but that's as low as I can go. I really need to make a decision soon, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand your situation, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your budget, I am willing to negotiate down to $825000. This represents a significant compromise from my previous offers and I believe it will be acceptable to both parties.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $775000, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to get concerned that we might not be able to reach an agreement.

I understand your concern, Bob. After further consideration, I am willing to offer the product at $800000. This represents a significant compromise from my original asking price, and I believe it will be a fair deal for both of us.
I've made a significant effort to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $785000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement.
